extracted_rules.rule: Basement Area Exclusion from Floor Area

Qualifiers.Applicability: Basements that do not contribute to the apparent mass of a building
Qualifiers.Exclusions: Basements that are above grade or contribute to the building mass

Constants.Procedures: Basement area need not be included in total floor area if below grade

Qualifiers.Exclusions: Basements in special flood hazard areas

Standards: May not be located in special flood hazard areas
May not extend beyond building footprint
May not encroach into required yards, except where main dwelling is permitted to extend into rear yard

Mandatory: Basement location outside special flood hazard areas
No encroachment into required yards unless permitted

Exceptions.Special cases: Main dwelling permitted to extend into rear yard

extracted_rules.rule: Floor Area Ratio (FAR) Note for Basements

Qualifiers.Applicability: Basements with first floor no more than 3' above grade
Qualifiers.Exclusions: Basements with first floor more than 3' above grade

Conditions.Mandatory: First floor no more than 3' above grade

Variables.Dimensional: Size/dimensional limits described in Figs 39–40 on pp. 42–43

Constants.Standards: Excavation will not affect grade or measurement of floor area if standards are met

Conditions.Mandatory: Standards described in Figs 39–40 on pp. 42–43 must be met
